description: time: fix Windows build after ceeedb519c4a

messages.text:
I also did not like your change. I was bitten twice there.

http://codereview.appspot.com/4967067/

Also, it is not possible to run windows test unless you have Windows PC. But you could easily build all windows packages to make sure they compile:

http://code.google.com/p/go-wiki/wiki/WindowsCrossCompiling

Alex

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=4beaeaead995 ***
